00007  *  This class is used for the surface which hold some icons
00008  *  for the cursor. By now it only draws the complete twirl,
00009  *  but more elements are planned.
00010  */
00011 
00012 #include "CCursor.h"
00013 
00014 CCursor::CCursor(SDL_Surface *p_screen)
00015 {
00016  mp_Surface = SDL_DisplayFormat(p_screen);
00017  SDL_FillRect(mp_Surface ,NULL, 0x0);
00018 }
00019 
00020 void CCursor::generateTwirls(CFont &Font)
00021 {
00022  // The positions from the fonts are from 9 to 14
00023  // You see, just six direction
00024  // What to do is to copy the first five twirls to the new row of the font tile
00025  // Copy the some inverted twirls and then put the last one at the end.
00026  // By that way the font tile will get smoother
00027  SDL_Rect twrect, fmrect;
00028  //SDL_Surface *srcsfc = Font.getSDLColouredSurface();
00029  SDL_Surface *srcsfc = Font.getSDLSurface();
00030 
00031  // Copy the first 5 tiles
00032  twrect.x=9*8;
00033  twrect.y = fmrect.x = 0;
00034  twrect.w = fmrect.w = 5*8;
00035  twrect.h = fmrect.h = 8; fmrect.y=0;
00036  SDL_BlitSurface(srcsfc, &twrect, mp_Surface, &fmrect);
00037 
00038  // now the complex stuff for the extra two tiles
00039  // Draw tile 9 and 10 inverted
00040  SDL_LockSurface(mp_Surface);
00041 
00042  Uint8 *src, *dst;
00043  src = dst = (Uint8*) mp_Surface->pixels;
00044 
00045  // for twirl 6 (LB down)
00046  src += (1*8 + 7*128)*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00047  dst += (5*8)*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00048  for(Uint16 i=0 ; i<8 ; i++ ) // Draw the inverse
00049  {
00050   memcpy(dst,src,8*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel);
00051   src -= 8*16*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00052   dst += 8*16*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00053  }
00054  src = dst = (Uint8*) mp_Surface->pixels;
00055 
00056  // for twirl 7 (LB down left)
00057  src += (0*8 + 7*128)*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00058  dst += (6*8)*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00059  for(Uint16 i=0 ; i<8 ; i++ ) // Draw the inverse
00060  {
00061   memcpy(dst,src,8*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel);
00062   src -= 8*16*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00063   dst += 8*16*mp_Surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00064  }
00065  SDL_UnlockSurface(mp_Surface);
00066 
00067  // Now copy the last twirl (8) taking the original 6th one
00068  twrect.x=14*8; twrect.y=0;
00069  twrect.w = fmrect.w = twrect.h = fmrect.h = 8;
00070  fmrect.x = 7*8; fmrect.y = 0;
00071  SDL_BlitSurface(srcsfc, &twrect, mp_Surface, &fmrect);
00072 }
00073 
00074 void CCursor::draw(SDL_Surface* dst, Uint8 character, Uint16 x, Uint16 y)
00075 {
00076  SDL_Rect src_rect, dst_rect;
00077 
00078  src_rect.x = character*8;
00079  src_rect.y = 0;
00080  dst_rect.x = x;
00081  dst_rect.y = y;
00082  dst_rect.w = src_rect.w = 8;
00083  dst_rect.h = src_rect.h = 8;
00084 
00085  SDL_BlitSurface(mp_Surface, &src_rect, dst, &dst_rect);
00086 }
00087 
00088 CCursor::~CCursor()
00089 {
00090  SDL_FreeSurface(mp_Surface);
00091 }
